sentence.Network_en: We use boldface type for vectors.

sentence.Network_en: Boldface italic type is used to mark very important terms when they are first defined.

sentence.Network_en: Design problems, which represent challenging applications of the text material, are identified by boldface problem numbers.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于本教材中较难的设计问题用黑体字题号来标志.
